name: Chrome Styled Context Menus
description: Makes the Firefox context menus look similar to Google Chrome's.
additional_info:
[20 September 2014] Removed "menupopup:not(#appmenu-popup)" from all items and restored/improved classic Firefox menu style for consistency. Also changed the secondary pane colour to grey.

[2 September 2014] Added support for the new combined menuitems in Firefox 32.

[31 August 2014] Added namespace URL, restored Firefox menu button's look for Classic Theme Restorer, Palemoon, etc.

[10 June 2014] Made the text black for checkbox menus when highlighted - see Bug 605985. 

[17 March 2014] Changed the Firefox button's menu appearance. Also increased the menu font size and height.

[15 March 2014] Released
